title: Doing Mrs. Morgan
description: Jenna Morgan has a problem. Well, make that a couple problems. First, she was recently divorced and her freedom has made her horny as hell. Which is only made worse when her ridiculously hot student Justin starts flirting with her relentlessly. But her biggest problem is that she doesn’t know how much longer she’ll be able to resist him. Will she put her career on the line to satisfy a sexual itch?MORE TO COME IN THE PLAYFUL NEW 'ADVENTURES OF A MILF' SERIES:'DOING THE COLLEGE STUD'(#2) COMING FEBRUARY!'DOING MY DAUGHTER'S BOYFRIEND'(#3) COMING MARCH!'DOING MY SON'S 2 BEST FRIENDS'(#4) COMING APRIL!'DOING THE PASTOR'S SON'(#5) COMING MAY!WARNING! THIS BOOK CONTAINS EXPLICIT SEXUALITY AND IS NOT SUITABLE FOR READERS BELOW THE AGE OF 18 YEARS!
author: Anastasia  Rose
